title: go-tour: Broken link in page 2 of online Go tour: http://golang.org/install/
body:
by **randfur**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
In page two of the Go tour.
http://tour.golang.org/#2
Click on the "install Go" link.


What is the expected output?
Browser should be taken to "http://golang.org/doc/install";


What do you see instead?
Instead the link goes to "http://golang.org/install/"; giving an error page:
"File install/

file not found: /go/install"


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
N/A

Which operating system are you using?
Windows 7

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
N/A
